allow: Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''C:\\Users\\Flint\\Desktop\\Development\\Projects\\Launch Calendar Tracker''; docker compose up -d")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/Flint/Desktop/Development/Projects/Launch Calendar Tracker" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Launch Calendar Tracker

A full-stack TypeScript monorepo for planning, executing, and tracking
time-boxed product launches with task management, KPI tracking, and reporting.

Features:
- Launch plan creation with date windows and strategy tags
- Task system with daily checklists, priorities, and dependencies
- Calendar view with task counts and completion percentages
- KPI tracking with target monitoring and status indicators
- Automatic alerts when KPIs fall outside targets
- CSV export reports

Tech stack:
- Frontend: Vite + React + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Express API with JWT auth
- Database: PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM
- Monorepo: pnpm workspaces

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
